# timeRange

**Instance Property**

The time range in the audio stream that the metrics and analytics apply to.

## Declaration

```swift
var timeRange: CMTimeRange { get }
```

## Getting speech metrics

- **version**: The version of the algorithm that the system uses to generate the metrics and analytics.
